content: this is a crochet pattern detailing the process to make a pickle rick slip bag inspired by episode 3 of season 3 of the adult swim program rick and morty this will make a long cylindrical bag that can fit pens pencils paint brushes pipes vapes cutlery candles carrots cucumbers or anything really it s a bag your only limit to what it can hold is your imagination this uses a moderate amount of pickle-colored yarn and very small amounts of black off-white red and light blue yarn all yarn used in this guide is worsted-weight acrylic yarn
